text: Nur eine Frau ("Only One Woman") is an East German film. It was released in 1958. It is based on the life of the Leipzig campaigner for women's rights, Louise Otto-Peters, who is portrayed in the film by Karla Runkehl.Nur Eine Frau: 1958 ==References== ==External links== * Category:1958 films Category:East German films Category:German-language films Category:Films directed by Carl Balhaus
title: Nur eine Frau
